content.detailedDescription: I was shooting hoops in my backyard around 5:40-ish. i saw many planes in the sky, it was darkening to a dark blue. then out of nowhere, i see two ufo's traveling from east to west across the sky at a speed that was faster than a plane. i ran and got my phone and immediately started recording. the video is also on youtube. just type in "[name redacted; trb]" and it will be the ufo upload in gresham.
content.summary: The 2 ufo's both came from the east and they were traveling west. the distance between them was like 2 football fields.

content.detailedDescription: Buna.Ma numesc papai zoltan,sunt nascut in romania.In data de 28 novembrie 2014 am venit in vacanta pe insula corsica mai exact intr-un sat numit sierrera.M-am gandit sa scriu despre niste lucruri ciudate de care am avut parte.Primul este acela ca in data de 05.01.2015 mergeam acasa din sat in munti si pe drum am vazut un obiect zburator,cred ca a fost rotund de culoare alba care zbura la o altitudine mica in linie dreapta deasupra muntilor si nu facea zgomot.Mi-am dat seama din prima secunda despre ce e vorba.Am fost foarte fericit cu gandul ca insfarsit am vazut si eu un ozn real si ca insfarsit am vazut dovada existentei ozn-urilor.Celalat eveniment tot in aceeasi zi putinel mai tarziu cand apunea soarele am vazut o bila in flacari pe cer care pica,m-am gandit ca e un meteorit si acum aterizeaza si o sa faca ravagii,dar in schimb nu am auzit nimic,nu am vazut explozie sa ceva de genu...Nici la stiri nimic nu s-a auzit de acesta.M-am simtit entuziasmat pentru ca e prima oara cand vad asa ceva.M-am gandit sa merg si sa caut locul aterizarii dar nu am putut sa-mi permit ca era noapte.Dupa scurt timp am mers la cabana unde locuiesc(in munti) iar pe drum am tot privit cerul atent si am zarit mai multe luminite ca si stelele care zburau zigzag.Am stiut ca sunt ozn-uri ca altceva nu puteau fi.M-am gandit sa impartasesc cele traite si cu alti si am dat de acest site.Am vazut ce au impartasit ceilalti si am zis ca scriu si eu despre cele vazute de mine.
content.summary: Am vazut o nava rotunda care nu facea zgomot desi era la o altitudine mica care zbura in linie dreapta deasupra muntilor.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my mother back to vegas from southern california, about half way/ near barstow ca, my mom started looking out the window and complaining about something really bright flashing in her eyes. a few minutes went by and she kept shading her eyes with her hand so i asked her what she was doing. she told me that there was a bright ball in the sky and the reflection was so bright it was bothering her eyes. i was driving and tried to look but the roof of the suv we were in made it impossible to see the object. i told her to take out her camera and take a few pictures and i would look at it when we got back to her house. she snapped 4 pictures then put her phone away. for the next 10 - 20 minutes my mom still kept saying that this thing was just hovering in the air and not moving at all. she finally stopped mentioning it and by the time we got to her house i had completely forgotten... i was in the process of moving and had so much to do. now i wish i would have looked at her camera right away. a few days later she brought it up and reminded me of the photos on her phone. i took a look and was dumbfounded.
content.summary: Glowing orb/ufo hovered in sky for 40 min

content.detailedDescription:
I stopped at a rest stop along highway 33 (i believe it is called hall creek), just before the turn-off to big white ski area when traveling north. i decided to snap a photo of the ski hill since you can see it from that vantage point. later, when looking through my photos, i noticed something shiny and streaking across the sky in one. i don't know what it is, but it doesn't really look like a plane and all other planes i saw that day had contrails. i also think that if it was a plane, i would have captured it without blur, so the object must have been moving fast and/or quite a bit lower than other aircraft. when i took the photo, i didn't see a thing in the sky...Just in the picture after.
this photo was taken with my cell phone and not altered in any way.
content.summary: Took picture of flying object unknowingly

content.detailedDescription:
July 1,2013 11:25pm todd gorman and i were sitting on his back deck,
having a conversation when all of a sudden 7 glowing objects appeared following a path except for the last object in the line was going in an up and down direction super fast, then they all disappeared, i was able to catch 5sec video of the footage
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was sitting on the back deck, outside when we saw 7 objects in path hovering and glowing the last objest was moving up and down direction, i captured it on video for 5sec

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 6:43 pm. my dad was outside smoking a cigarette and saw a turquoise colored light in the sky.
i was cooking dinner and looked at the clock. 
when i went out side to see what he wanted we saw two lights in the sky one was turquoise green and the other was star like glistening like a diamond.
i was not sure what to think at first. 
what really caught our attention was when the turquoise object stopped in flight hovered and went the opposite direction. 

we tried to take a picture but they were too far away to try to zoom into. i would say they were near golden.  
we are both certain that these objects are not stars or a comet.
content.summary: Just briefly looked up and saw a turquoise light hovering

content.detailedDescription:
1. watching sunset on balcony of hotel/resort
2. pattern of lights started to appear in the se sky and formed a circular type of pattern.
3. something with intelligent control
4. after forming a circular pattern some lights went out two changed directions two different times and had such a smooth fluid & fast change in direction. they then dimmed out and minutes later appeared in different parts of the sky many miles from the initial sighting.
5. shocked, looked for my camera and told others that were also around to come see, which they did.Everyone was shocked and did not know what they were.
6. they dimmed out.
content.summary: For the past three nights 5/12/2014 to 5/14/2014 thee have been numerous orange glowing orbs all across the ocean sky. they have appeared just after 9:30pm est. some lights were scattered and appeared randomly, others have been in formation.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bed, and found myself awake, and unable to move, i was like, what the heck, i realized i could move my head, so i looked to my right, and there beside me were two little figures, commonly referred to as greys, i got the feeling that all was well, and i should remain calm, so i did so, then all of a sudden i was, i think, being scanned by some device, which ran blue and green lights over certain areas of my person, after which, they nodded to me, seemed to smile a bit, took a couple steps away from me, disappeared, and im now writing this....
content.summary: I awoke to a presence beside my bed.

content.detailedDescription: Around 2-3 am myself and two other individuals were hunting on our reservation. we had stopped to wait for another vehicle to meet up and go into an area we were intereested in. as soon as we met up, the vehicle (our friends) began driving to a high spot. we eventually began to follow the other vehicle we lost them, which was no big deal. we then saw some headlights in the distance on a spot opposite from where our meeting spot was.  we then started to pursue the headlights which were something that freak us out later, when we drove up the hill and only acceablie way to where we thought was our friends. when we made it to the higher level there were no cars whats so ever, we then saw the headlights flashi once on a much higher plateau which confused the hell out of us because the highth and the time it would take to get to the top of this plateau was freaky fast. when we got half way up to where the plateau was we saw a car coming down from our meeting spot from earlier which freaked us out thinking it was a farmer following us but all along it was our friends vehicle. but at this point we still think we're following our friends, and we finally make it to the top to find no one at all we were confused we all had very good binoculars and we saw the car that we thought was farmers finally make it up to where we were. by this time we had seen multiple ufos that were stationary that balls of light begin to move in odd maneuvers to the east of us and we could clearly see that they were moving miles and miles a direction and turning around and going back miles and miles from where we saw them and began to be stationary. we were convinced we followed a ufo that led us up on the plateua. we saw the car approach us and eventually seeing it was our friends car. we were terrified because we thought we were following them and when we began looking above we saw which to me and the rest of us in the car thought was a ufo right above us which looked completely different from the ones on the horizon. we stayed up there from about 4-sun up when it was dark we could see tail lights show up out of know where from about 2-3 miles away now these we weird red lights there were standard 2 red lights like a car but had another red light of to the right like an right triangles vertices. the weird thing is we didn't see no headlights at all!! we had miles and miles of vantage view and did no see no headlights move in a traditional way. these lights just showed up and dissapared we waited untill light and saw no cars. there was one way up and one way out. the morning came and all dissapeared except for one, the one above us, the only light in the sky. i'm pretty familiar with the brightest stars in the sky and orion had passed the horizon east of us and the brightest stars dicipated from the sun but this one followed us every where untill we shrugged them off and began hunting. there was a building up top and had a tower that had telephone satellites the tower was far too short for regulation blinking lights for a warning to airplanes. it was odd/thrilling/ exciting to the point i was petrified to take a piss haha the funny thing is when we were done hunting we told our friends we went so high up there to follow them and they were confused and laughing saying we got tricked by a ufo. we had very good binoculars and two high scoped riles so we were not looking with the naked eye. although it was dark, this area where we were was pretty rural( no houses in sight for miles) i believe they landed because these things were manipulating themselves into cars literally or deceiving us. there was no drinking or drugs involved.
content.summary: Ufo deceiving us into driving spots where we could see several ufos and eventually one following us until the sun  came up

content.detailedDescription: @ about 10pm, az time i was standing in my room, total darkness, and looking out my window. all of a sudden a light showed up, about 45 degrees above horizon, and was the same size and brilliance of a night star until it flashed bright and then returned to regular brilliance. it was the same kind of flash like if you saw a lighthouse light at sea sweeping in front of your eye. not blinding but bright enough to know it was flashing beight. yellow gold reddish in color. the light after fading, would then just dissappear. like it almost got turned off. this happened over 15min and cycled like this about 8 times. when the light went off and then reappeared it would show up in a different spot just a little further away from its previous location. it slowly drifted like this until not visible again. 2 airplanes flew past this light or at least appeared to, 1 on each side, which allowed us to see the difference in lighting from regular aircraft. .Faa flashing lights, and whatever this was.
content.summary: Star like light appeared, got bright, flashed, dissappeard. repeated multiple times. moved slowly

content.detailedDescription: I was in back of my house , when i decided to take a smoke then i  look up to see if the moon was out that night, then that's when i saw three black round  object  flying next to each other , no lights, no sound and  flying about the speed of at least 200 or more per hours, so as i ran to the front of my house i notice that the 3 object was still  speeding ,  i call my wife to come and see this object, but by the time she came down they were gone. later that night i  was thinking to myself what i just witness, i didn't want people to think aim crazy so i kept this to myself, my wife kept asking me what i saw, but i couldn't tell her what i saw in the sky, i usually don't believe in stuff like that, but what i saw was real not a dream, what is going on  in this world. the objects appeared to move towards northeast heading east at a fast paste , i coul'nt believe my eyes so i soon as i saw them i ran to the front of my house to get a better view, then i saw them move faster but small, they were gone, i know the differents between airplanes, weather balloons, and helicopters , no this was something different , not from here.  i did a little research and notice that they got two army base in the area, but don't think is military.   please help me realize what i saw was real... i can't be losing my mind.
content.summary: They were three shadows.

content.detailedDescription:
I will give a brief overview- as i would like to speak to someone.

- distortion of time
- recorded markings on body
- recorded household occurances
- long sleep and vivid dreams after events
- random information realizations
- positive change in personal behavior


i would not be wasting your time by telling you this story. mufon- please repsond accordingly so i can explain my experience. i am 18 years old- would like to tell someone other than family.
content.summary: Few occurances that lead me to conclusion

content.detailedDescription:
This report describes only one encounter. the one that has left me with the most unanswered questions. however, i have had many sightings and feel as though i may be under surveillance. my experiences started when i was eight and persist to this day. i need to speak with someone who has experience with these matters. i need to understand. 

i only want to be contacted via email. i do not want my name associated with this report. 

  a couple years ago, i had been out with friends until around 1:00 am. i was driving home the way i always go. i have a heavy foot and was enjoying an exciting drive on empty roads. 
  as i was coming up to a nice s curve i noticed what i thought to be a deer moving thru the brush to my right about to cross the road in front of me. i braked hard to avoid a collision. 
   as the "deer" crossed the road in front of me, i was just clearing the bend and could see the road ahead. 
  i immediately saw the glowing kashmir blue light brightly emanating from the "mask/helmet/face" of a tall "man" standing on the left side of the road. "he" must have stood seven feet tall or more. the "deer" ran up to the "man" and stopped directly in front of "him". 
  in the next second my headlights fell directly on the pair. i had slowed down to a speed of about 15-20 mph to avoid the collision and had a clear direct view. this next second lasted an hour in my mind. 
  the creature was similar to a deer in size and overall shape. it had a dark brown/grey covering that i want to call fur but was more likely leathery. it had the head similar to a dog with an elongated snout and short ears. it had the build of a greyhound with long legs supporting a smaller, slender frame. the legs were strange. they may have bent backwards but i cannot be sure. i recall that it moved strangely as it crossed the road. it had no visible tail. 
  the "man" was tall, as i said before with a human build. "he" was wearing a black suit that had several "tools" and pockets. similar to something a navy seal would wear during nighttime ops. "he" was covered from hard to toe. gloves, boots, and mask all connected. there was no flesh exposed, like an astronaut's suit. "he" had a visor over his "eyes" that glowed a soft velvety blue brightly. the visor was rectangular with rounded edges and was positioned to be consistent with human anatomy. the light obscured the shape of the head somewhat, but again, it seemed to have a head consistent with human anatomy from a straightforward perspective. 
  "he" was watching me as closely as i was watching "him" as i passed slowly seven feet away. we made "eye" contact and the blue glow followed me in my rear view mirror until i made the next bend and "he" was out of sight. 
  at this point a very unsettling thing occurred. i felt "him" call to me. it was like a feeling more than words. it wanted me to come back. it was a strong "urge" to turn around mixed with feelings of peace and tranquility. suddenly i realized that i had unconsciously brought my car to a stop. this frightened me to my core. it still does. i immediately floored the car and blew the stop sign at the end of the road as i raced to home and safety. 
  
  in the years that passed, several small incidents occurred that could be and were written off as just strange. however, a pattern was developing. 
  it wasn't until four years later that i was able to confirm my suspicions.
  my girlfriend and i moved to a secluded location in upper bucks county. we used to smoke cigarettes on the front porch late at night. one winter night we noticed a very bright flash of white light coming from the back woods behind the house. it was so bright it could have been lightning, but there was no clouds in the sky. we went to the back yard to investigate becoming suspicious of a possible intruder taking pictures in our woods. the flashing continued intermittently but with no discernible pattern. 
  i then realized that the light was actually off the ground at least ten feet. this made us uncomfortable and we went inside. 
  this became a reoccurring phenomena at our home until one night we decided to find the source. we took a gun and a giant spotlight and tried to find it. we drove around the back of our property and discovered that it was definitely coming from our woods. we listened and watched in silence but heard nothing and could only see the light in the sky above not directly towards us. we then drove back to our driveway and began to see it clearly again. i tried to flash it and find it with the spotlight but had no luck. it simply flashed as it pleased with no reaction to us.
  then we heard a familiar sound. it sounded as though a 747 was going overhead. i expected to see a low flying airliner pass overhead but was instead shocked at what i saw. a triangular craft passed slowly overhead maybe a hundred feet above us. it had three red flashing lights at each point and several smaller glowing orange lights in between. it was making the sound of a large jet airplane, however, if it had been a jet it would have deafened us at the distance it passed. it also moved much to slowly to be any type of jet propelled craft. it was approximately 30 feet wide and had cubic features. 
  the craft moved over us and paused briefly directly over where we thought the source of the light to be coming from. it then vanished without sound and there was no more flashes of light that evening. we assume that it had collected some sort of probe that was spying on us. 
  this incident frightened my girlfriend and she was no longer willing to investigate the flashing lights that persisted on several occasions. 
  not long after that, i became aware that i was being startled awake several nights a week at precisely 3:33 am. it happened so frequently and was so unsettling that i began to research the "condition" i might be suffering from. i tried the suggestions provided by other people experience but came to no solid conclusions. then i found a page that tied 3:33 am to ufo activity and connected the dots. 
  once i became afraid of the possibility of abduction i discontinued discussing anything of the sort with my spouse. i do not want her to be afraid. 
   since then we have moved twice and have not encountered any more lights. however, we also quit smoking and quit looking. we don't go out late at night. i forced myself to stop looking at the clock when i wake up at night. i also now use sleep inducing drugs at night and i can't remember my dreams anymore, which suits me fine. 
  
  i want to know if anyone else out there has seen this "man" with the blue light or are being monitored by flashing lights. they are not inconspicuous. i also need to know if my new daughter is safe. is there anyway to be safe? will a secure bunker keep them out? is there a possibility that these are non violent, harmless watchers or are they all invasive abductors? 
please advise.
content.summary: Saw entity on roadside with creature companion. called to me.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to my car i noticed what looked like one lone star off toto the side. it just disappeared out of nowhere.
content.summary: Object in the sky looked just like a star disappeared as if someone flipped a switch.

content.detailedDescription: Estava na represa jurumirim em avarã© fotografando o entardecer. fotografei o jet ski com a bã³ia e fiz uma composiã§ã£o com a ponte ao fundo. tirei 3 fotografias num intervalo de 2 segundos entre elas. depois vi que havia um helicã³ptero a ne, uns 45 graus, e tirei duas fotografias dele. uma com  o zoom da lente e outra sem o zoom para dar uma composiã§ã£o a fotografia. tirei as fotos e continuei fotografando o por do sol. a noite quando comecei a ver as fotografias fia que em 4 delas havia uma sequãšncia de luzes estranhas. peã§o que vejam e me coloco a disposiã§ã£o para eventuais esclarecimentos.
content.summary: Observamos as luzes apã³s o evento.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from thornton to commece city on 120th ave and saw 4 bright white, pulsating lights standing still in a curved shape in the sky, they were in the same spot for about 15 minutes. then the lowest one slowly descended to the horizon. i was in the car and could not see where it seemed to have landed. a few minutes later, the highest one did the same thing. then, finally the other two did the same. they all seemed to have landed in the same area. looking to my right, there was another much higher in the sky that didn't move. i thought they were airplanes until minutes passed by and they were all in the same spot, making the same shape, and compared to the airplanes in the sky, they were much larger and the light was whiter and not blinking but twinkling. this whole time i was wondering if anyone else was curious about them.
content.summary: 5 or 6, very large, white lights pulsating still in the sky

content.detailedDescription: The summer of 2012 in north east edmonton about 2 blocks from londondary mall, a few friends and i where having a fire in a back yard when i looked up to the sky and saw a bluish white orb like light just floating across the sky like a satellite but was way to big to be a satellite. i pointed at it and asked my friend, "what is that?". every one looked and said it was probably a plane or a satellite when all of a sudden i heard a plane and i pointed to it and said "hey guys, that is a plane i hear and see and that orb is closer to us then the plane. so what is it?" at that moment, the orb went from moving in one direction horizontally to moving so fast and leaving our atmosphere to make it look to us like the orb flew away and hid behind a star. the most amazing thing i have ever seen.
content.summary: Moving light in sky. then moved at a speed like nothing on earth

content.detailedDescription: I visited niagara falls with my family about 10 years ago. we took various pictures while there but never noticed anything. after 10 years i was randomly looking through the pictures and noticed what appears to be a ufo. it is not a plane, helicopter or cloud. it is saucer shaped.
content.summary: Ufo over niagra falls

content.detailedDescription: Myself along with four other witnesses observed a bright orange-yellow colored orb ascend from the foothills across the valley and the object began to take a very unusual flight path.  it's accent was very fast until once it was high in the sky it began bouncing right and left at a weird hover. it did this for about two minutes before it moved extremely fast side to side and it's light flickered before disappearing. this event followed another sighting that occurred minutes before in roughly the same location as the detailed sighting.  first sighting was witnessed by myself and one other person but the second sighting was observed by myself and four other people as well as the guys at the gas station down the road saw also.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange object seen making very fast and unusual flight path

content.detailedDescription:
On friday evening, my family was driving home to payne ohio. about 8 miles outside of town we observed a bright white light in the sky, appearing to be close to payne. 

as we got closer, i asked my wife what it was. to wit, she responded an airplane. i told her that airplanes do not have bright white lights unless landing or taking off and since there was no airport nearby, it couldn't be. 

she again suggested airplane because it had some blinking red lights with it as well. 

as we drew closer we could tell it was not moving at all. 

we got to the point where it was about 2 football fields away from us and about 1000 ft. in the air. at this point we could tell it was not an airplane or helicopter. 

i rolled the window down to take a couple pics, it was completely silent. at that point it started moving, slowly at first and then accelerated to a speed well over 300 miles an hour as it disappeared from our view within 30 seconds or so.
content.summary: Hovering object remained still without noise for a long time until we stopped to view it, it then took of slowly and then accelerated to extreme speeds

content.detailedDescription:
Pulsing multi color object flying low over rt1 woodbridge, nj

pulsing multi colored object …...Seen flying in from north west and flew over rt 1 hovered a short time, shot off to north here's a sighting at approx 9:03 pm on aug 26 2014 in woodbridge,nj near the crossing of rt 1 and st georges ave ….... after shopping from local shoprite attention was drawn to the north west sky of a low slow moving light that was changing colors in sequence, not strobing but steady pulses of red,blue green and then it would repeat itself.. at first thought it was a helicopter but when it hovered made a complete tight circle and then shot off to the north turning a solid green i thought otherwise. my ground location was aprox ½ mile south of object attempted to stop a few cars to confirm sighting......... one did stop but he said it was drone..............Object was totally silent ….................No motor noise object was low about 30 degrees off horizon it could be covered with my thumb if held at arms length object first appeared from nw flew east a short time, hovered over a new convenience store/gas station on rt 1 north made a tight circle then dove down and turned a dull green and flew to north sequence was red blue green repeated many times with vibrant colors i did take a few grab shots of the event with a digital camera and a short vid, it shows a cylinder shaped object ( when zoomed in on computer )and the video shows a blinking fuzzy dot moving north pulsing rbg colors event lasted approx 3 min from 9:03 to 9:06 pm it was warm and clear about 75 degrees with good visibility …..........Object was about 500 ft in height and moved in controlled manner .But the colors were so pure clear and grouped and vibrant for it to be nav lights on a plane or chopper ….....It looked like halogen christmas lights ….......

note: this craft appears to mimic the colonia, nj (woodbridge township )sighting of same date and time, reported in site ….. my location was approx 2 miles south of that reported event …..............

object's flight path was well below the approach pattern of newark airport but ufo or drone? if it was either they are flying in a heavily congested airspace with planes on approach to newark airport....................Thanks.............
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dumbell shaped craft that pulsed red/blue/green seen hover then shoots off at high speed

content.detailedDescription: I was out of the place i work infront of the door and than i noteced that object and i started to record with my samsung galaxy s4 , it just flew straight no sound not so much reflection , it went behind the clouds i think
content.summary: It was just flying and no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking photos of chemtrails.. when i looked at the photos i saw this object in the photos.  i went back outside and could see the object with my naked eye.  i took more pics and enhanced them.  in one of the photos, it appears to be behind the chemtrail. i had two of the photos enhanced.  you can see the lights, they appear to be in a pattern. 
i tried to get video but was too shaky to get a good video.  i have never seen anything like this in my life.   a little shaken up!  after trying to get video, it disappeared. 

*i have more pictures of this*
content.summary: Was taking pics of chemtrails and saw this in photos.. then could see with naked eye.

content.detailedDescription: I was lying in bed when i decided to look out the window, as i do most nights. one set of lights caught my attention; at first i thought it was a passenger plane, but after a minute i realized the object was stationary, or nearly so. i watched what appeared to be a geometric, spherical arrangement of lights change color, flash, pulse off and on. occasionally the object seemed to move, but it was weird, it moved as if attached to a tether at its top most point, much like a tetherball. after a few minutes, i saw an actual passenger jet flying northwest to southeast, and could then compare the two objects. this verified that the first object was not a plane. i went outside to make sure i wasn't just seeing a reflection on my n bedroom window. the object was still there. (the lights, i'd estimate 10-50 points of light illuminated at any one time) moved, morphed, and gave the object the appearance of splitting into 2 objects from time to time, only to merge back together. the best explanation i can give of the ufo's appearance is that it looked a bit like a giant led disco ball, with its movements and it's lights pulsing very organically. it looked, for lack of a better word, alive, nothing at all like the blinking of a video game arcade or advertising display. after about 20 minutes of watching the object, i finally made up my mind and went to sleep.
content.summary: I saw a large, geometric sphere with lights flashing at the corners.

content.detailedDescription: At 1:30am i was up late reading at my desk. the window of my then bedroom overlooked the back garden and i often had the window open even in winter. this was to have a cool breeze so i didnt fall asleep..On the night my window also happened to open.. i was sitting reading when all of a sudden i had this strange feeling that something was going to happen at which point as i glanced up a very bright ufo, appeared from behind my neighbours house.It flew between the houses that back onto mine 3 times each time it lit up very brightly.  at this point i closed the window and the cutains and essentially hid for a 2 or 3 minutes. when i looked out from behind my curtain it was hovering above the hose next door to me and sort of blinking brightly before dimming and so on.I also noticed a red coloured tinge on the underside of it at this point. this was the last time i saw it.  interestingly, on this day i remember it well as i was on my way home i bumped into my mother and her husband on the way and she had complained i was wearing the wrong clothes as this day was quite mild and warm and i had on a boots coat ad so onand she told me to get changed. after this as i approached the front of the house i for some reason looked up and right away noticed a strange triangular cloud above the roof of the house. literally scraping the roof but actually there were hardly any other clouds around at the time. i thought this odd but thought no more of it. i am sorry to see i do not have any media of any nature to confirm my case but that i do seem to remember that there reports a short after in the local press that flying saucers had been seen in sheffield. but i have never seen this reports.
content.summary: Up late reading when i noticed the above fly straight past my window 3 times. then hovered above my house. strange triangular cloud there too.

content.detailedDescription:
on december 4, 2014.  around 7:00 p.M. in the evening.  i was sitting on our deck looking out towards the bay.

 out over the bay an orange/red round orb appeared ( i had seen this a few nights earlier)

 i told my husband to look .  as we were looking at the orb, a second orb appeared to the left the first orb.  then a third orb appeared to the left of the second orb.   they stayed stationary about two minutes.  then the third orb went back into the second orb and then the second orb went back into the first orb.  at this time the orb disappear. they appeared in a straight line. and they appeared to be controlled by the main orb

 i am an amateur and i am used to viewing the night sky. it was not a flare, airplane, meteor, etc
content.summary: Orb was above water in mobile bay.  then another appeared to left of the first, then a third orb appeared.  then each orb went back into first orb.  then it disppear

content.detailedDescription: 1992 christmas season in great falls, montana the mall stayed open until 11pm. after closing and cleaning the salon i worked at, i drove home. sky was clear and roads were empty as much of the town was sleeping. i saw light coming from over my car and leaned to peer out windshield. almost directly over my car, just above the tree line, i saw a black triangular shaped object with soft lights covering the entire bottom surface in sort of a bowling pin pattern. they were not blinding and i was able to see the black structure between the lights. it moved at approximately 5mph and made no sound. i stopped my car because no one was behind me and put my window down to listen. i still heard nothing. i felt like i could reach out and touch the thing. i didn't feel threatened and i didn't feel i was noticed. it was probably 60 feet or longer. i watched it for about two or three minutes wondering if it was a stealth, since i'd never seen one and lived near tinker air force base. but after a few minutes, i felt i was being watched and proceeded home, resisting the urge to look in the rearview mirror. the object never messed with anything electric with my car, the street lights stayed on, and no homes appeared to lose power. in recent searches, i haven't seen pictures of any stealth's that have lights like this underneath. and i've only told a few people up until now. i've told myself for years it was probably something from the base, but deep down i've serious doubts that anything man made could move so slow and silent.
content.summary: Triangle with bottom covered in soft circular lights (formation of bowling pins) flying above treeline. no sound. moving aprox. 5 mph

content.detailedDescription: I was out side my home at 29 maplelawn drive smoking a cigarette watching the sky and the moon and the stars then i saw large and small objects dim and bright lights moving east as when i saw them i started counting them as i was doing this andy from wcax channel 3 walk in front of my home with his dog and i yelled to him to look up and i said do you see all those large and small lights filling each other the big ones were in front and the small ones were in back of them but at a distance behind they were about 6 to 15 miles wide all head east i allways watch the sky and never seen so many at one time then i came my home and called the south burlington vt airport and spoke to operation and he was going to talk to the air traffic controllers. i all so called wcax channel3 news and told them about what i saw they could be more then forty but the clouds rolled in and that's it
content.summary: Was out side my home sky was clear at 8.30 and saw about forty lights and small lights and large light and they were falling one another some very high and some some what lower and a channel 3 man from wcax show them too he lives on my street with his dog

content.detailedDescription:
Witness (a) submitted his cd to william konkoleski, mi sd, because he viewed a video presentation by william about alien contact and the witness believes he has had similar events happen to him that he feels that the source cause is alien contact.  witness (a) has had a long history of events that the witness feels are alien associated anomalies.  
event 1:  approximately 2005 – venice beach, ca – suffered sting ray bite, severe pains, aliens were sending him a warning message.
event 2:  2006 janesville, wi – witness felt someone was outside around the house, found air valve caps from his vehicle tires off and lying on the ground.  
event 3:  witness found electrical outlet screw off caps were left in off position.
event 4:  dec, 2006 – bright orb video submitted by witness.
event 5:  sep, 2014 – second video submitted by witness, moth wings seen fluttering.
event 6:  oct, 2014 - pictures of mysterious finger prints found on digital picture.
content.summary: Several circumstantial events described, video of an orb, event 4 of 6, is the most unusual of the six events.

content.detailedDescription: As i have said. i found this ufo by accident. as i was looking at our old house, where we use to live on google earth, i went down to street level. as i began to go down our old street, my finger accidently pushed my computer screen up into the sky. there it was. i immediately knew it was a ufo, by what i saw. as of december 4, 2015 it is still in the sky, where google earth captured it's image. if someone will call me, i can instruct them where to go, and they can view it for themselves. as i instruct them, i would like to stay on the phone so i can get their reactions. i'm not in any hurry, but if you want to see it, call soon, because if google earth finds out that it's there, they might remove it, by taking another photo. as you will see, this ufo is in a clear blue sky, with the exceptions of three jet streams.
content.summary: I found this ufo on google earth
